channel.title: duo on Rusland 1
channel.description: Recent content in duo on Rusland 1

item.title: До свиданья, дорогая!
item.description: Я СМЕЛЕЙ (2019) I am braver – from their first and only album Себя потерял (2019). A world of colorful paints But I am just a shadow Don’t look for me I’m braver Don’t look for me I’m braver Don’t look for me I’m braver The crescent moon Will fall on you from the sky Shattering hearts Into a thousand pieces It will stop And make you understand You will never love again You will never love again You will never love again

item.title: Shokalsky Revenge
item.description: The band (or duo) is no longer active, but this is not a bad legacy. The first three tracks can be found on Репортаж с места событий (2016). 28 Also appeared on the compilation Ты Quoi (Чудесаунд) (2019): Spotify, YouTube.

item.title: горемыка – Scary sounds in Russian
item.description: Debut single (2020) and title track from an EP with four songs. Video on YouTube (featuring scenes from the film Лунная радуга, 1983), lyrics here and below. Если кто и прав Я его накажу. Солнце не взойдет Если не танцевать.

item.title: Электрофорез 3x
item.description: Всё будет нормально? Single from 2019 (Spotify), video from 2020. Lyrics Икея From #5 (2018). Lyrics Русская принцесса From Quo Vadis (2017). See the title track and a video with lyrics and translation. For the Russian princess, there is also a lyric video.

item.title: Komsomolsk 3x
item.description: Азбука плохого вкуса (ABC of bad taste, 2017) The lyrics appear on screen. Азбука Вкуса (ABC of Taste) is a supermarket. Всё исчезло (Everything disappeared, 2018) I clicked somewhere (я нажала что-то) and everything disappeared (исчезло всё). Everyone has their own swamp (у каждого своё болото); watch how everything will disappear (смотри как всё исчезнет).
